contentfulPagePressRelease.title: World Trade Tower Qatar Turns Blue To Mark World Diabetes Day

childMarkdownRemark.html:
The World Trade Center joined Qatar Diabetes Association, a member of Qatar Foundation, by lighting in blue - the color of the blue circle for diabetes - to mark World Diabetes Day on 14 November and raise awareness of diabetes.

The lightings were testimony to the power of combined efforts to alter the diabetes landscape and provide a strong visual element to attract attention to the diabetes cause.

The World Trade Tower- Qatar was chosen for its importance and fame, giving impetus to the celebrations of Qatar Diabetes Association.

To find out more about Qatar Diabetes Association, please click here.
